snippet.title: Who I See - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Game Site: https://gamejolt.com/games/whoisee/34...

Piece together what you are through the perceptions of others in this 2nd-person, hand-drawn mystery, Who I See, where the story is told through the NPCs observing you!

To overwhelmingly positive reception, this mystery has called eerie, lively, haunting. The Definitive Edition is releasing for FREE on November 24th, including the base game, its previous expansion, and its brand new one, all of it doubling the original amount of content. There's never been a better time to play! 

PCGAMER's Top 5 Free Games of the Week!

Featured Game of Gamejolt!

Judge's Top Pick in AdvJam2018! 

Most Innovative Entry in AdvJam2018!

Thank you for all of your support!
